attributes.action: Enforce social media companies to provide an option to disable endless scrolling
attributes.additional_details: When a setting is available to completely turn off endless scrolling, people can easily limit their exposure to continuous content. However, leaving individuals to rely solely on constant vigilance to control their social media habits is exhausting and feels like an ongoing battle. By providing an option in the settings, users can make a one-time adjustment and effortlessly maintain healthier usage habits.
attributes.background: We respectfully request the government to enforce social media companies to provide an option for disabling endless scrolling, allowing users to better manage their time and foster healthier online habits.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: 

Regulate how social media firms maximise user engagement.
